/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The road itself is lined with bare trees, their branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding to the tranquility of the scene. On the left side of the road, a street lamp stands tall, perhaps illuminating the area as dusk falls. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the trees and the sky, creating a sense of depth and openness. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
